subtests.name: Sanity check for testValue length; if this fails, variou absolute offsets in the test below need to be adjusted to be less than testValue.length
Initial .value set on input-appended should set selectionStart to end of value
Initial .value set on input-not-appended should set selectionStart to end of value
Initial .value set on input-appended-prefocused should set selectionStart to end of value
Initial .value set on input-not-appended-prefocused should set selectionStart to end of value

Initial .value set on textarea-not-appended-prefocused should set selectionEnd to end of value
onselect should fire when selectionStart is changed
onselect should fire when selectionStart is changed on input-appended
onselect should fire when selectionStart is changed on input-not-appended
onselect should fire when selectionStart is changed on input-appended-prefocused
onselect should fire when selectionStart is changed on input-not-appended-prefocused
onselect should fire when selectionStart is changed on textarea-appended

onselect should fire when selectionEnd is changed
onselect should fire when selectionEnd is changed on input-appended
onselect should fire when selectionEnd is changed on input-not-appended
onselect should fire when selectionEnd is changed on input-appended-prefocused
onselect should fire when selectionEnd is changed on input-not-appended-prefocused
onselect should fire when selectionEnd is changed on textarea-appended

onselect should fire when selectionEnd is changed on textarea-not-appended-prefocused
Setting selectionStart to a value larger than selectionEnd should increase selectionEnd
Setting selectionEnd to a value smaller than selectionStart should decrease selectionStart
selectionStart edge-case values
selectionEnd edge-case values
selectionStart and selectionEnd should remain the same when selectionDirection is changed
